name: 完美的一天 / A Perfect Day
name_original: 完美的一天 / A Perfect Day
description:
Back to the last day of 90’s in Mainland China, you got an unexpected holiday from your primary school, do you still remember what you have done?

Have you Given the love letter to her?
At a narrow game room, played whole day Playstation?
Digged some adult treasures under your parents’s bed?

Or it wasn’t like that, you heard a obscure story from a blind vagrant.

A 12 years old boy have intruded into the world of adult accidentally at that day.

Even though you say “I can’t remember anything”.

That’s OK.

Because it’s enough you can’t forget about this:

It is A Perfect Day of you.

Features:

AVG GamePlay
Story Based on realism
Unique hand-drawn art style
Sense of the 90’s in Mainland China.
Multi-branch story
Multi-end
Old school music
